bike.description: A2-SL custom-butted alloy w/ PowerCurve down tube, oversized seat tube. Rear triangle: A1-SL alloy w/ S-bend chainstays, cold-forged dropout and replaceable hanger
bike.paint_description: White w/ Green; Black w/ Red - Matte

FSA square taper w/ sealed cartridge bearing
Formula FM21 / Shimano RM30 / alloy 32H hubs, Vera Terra DPM23
Oval M100, alloy riser bar, 9° sweep, 31.8mm diameter, 660mm wide, 15mm rise
Oval M213, 3D-forged alloy, 31.8mm clamp diameter, 6° rise
Oval M200 w/ satin steel rails
Oval M200, alloy double-bolt micro-adjust, 31.6mm x 350mm
